casebody.data:
Bret FREY, M.D.; and Renown Regional Medical Center, a Domestic Non-Profit Corporation, Petitioners,
v.
The SECOND JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF WASHOE; and the Honorable Elliott A. Sattler, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Jonathon Olivas; Tiffany Olivas, Individually and on Behalf of, as the Natural Parents of Samuel Steven Olivas, a Minor Child; Carson Tahoe Regional Healthcare, d/b/a Carson Tahoe Regional Medical Center; Sheldon Kop, M.D., an Individual; and Landis, Kop, Carlevato, Loos & Shonnard, Ltd., d/b/a Tahoe Carson Radiology, a Domestic Professional, Real Parties in Interest. No. 77253 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED DECEMBER 13, 2018

DENIED.
